Articles.Content:
Is there any bonus science or anything to messing around near the Easter eggs?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-01T22:24:15Z" title="03/01/2015 10:24  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 1, 2015</time> by MoridinUK**
  
prefix
Sadly no. They are just fun things to find.

I think it will be kind of cool, if we in one of the buildings had some kind of "hall of fame" corner where we could see awards for every "easter egg" that was found.. Or some photos on the wall or something.

But most of all I would like to see the mod "final frontier" implemented in the v.1.0 of kerbal.

Why? - Well it is a very good achievement monitoring system who track every kerbals career. 

 For example when you send your first kerbal into space you get a medal for that, and so on.

In stock KSP the answer is indeed "No".

To change that no into a solid yes you might want [**DMagic Orbital Science**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64972). It does not only add extra science parts, it also offers contracts and rewards for doing science at or near 'anomalies'.
Cool, but they must fix them because much of the artefacts were buried after a terrain reworking some updates ago.

The coolest thing they could do with the artifacts is to give us a mystery to solve and a story to reveal, maybe unlocking an Ã‚Â´alien tech-treeÃ‚Â´ with unique-to-it gadgets, along the way. Ideally, at least some of them would be placed in different places for each game... well, just dreaming, i guess..

You may also want to look at my [Anomaly Surveyor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109471-0-90-Contract-Pack-Anomaly-Surveyor-v1-0-3-2015-02-24) contract pack which has contracts for visiting the easter eggs (using the 0.90 waypoint system.
